options.name: options
async
options.description: Whether to enable a background sending mode that is optimized for bulk sending. In async mode, messages/send will immediately return a status of "queued" for every recipient. To handle rejections when sending in async mode, set up a webhook for the 'reject' event. Defaults to false for messages with no more than 10 recipients; messages with more than 10 recipients are always sent asynchronously, regardless of the value of async.

options.name: autoText
options.description: Whether or not to automatically generate a text part for messages that are not given text

options.name: autoHtml
options.description: Whether or not to automatically generate an HTML part for messages that are not given HTML

options.name: bccAddress
options.description: An optional address to receive an exact copy of each recipient's email

options.name: fromName
options.description: Optional from name to be used

options.name: googleAnalyticsCampaign
options.description: Optional string indicating the value to set for the utm_campaign tracking parameter. If this isn't provided the email's from address will be used instead.

options.name: googleAnalyticsDomains
options.description: An array of strings separated by a comma (,) indicating for which any matching URLs will automatically have Google Analytics parameters appended to their query string automatically

options.name: html
options.description: The html you want to send

options.name: important
options.description: Whether or not this message is important, and should be delivered ahead of non-important messages

options.name: inlineCss
options.description: Whether or not to automatically inline all CSS styles provided in the message HTML - only for HTML documents less than 256KB in size

options.name: ipPool
options.description: The name of the dedicated ip pool that should be used to send the message. If you do not have any dedicated IPs, this parameter has no effect. If you specify a pool that does not exist, your default pool will be used instead.

options.name: preserveRecipients
options.description: Whether or not to expose all recipients in to "To" header for each email

options.name: returnPathDomain
options.description: A custom domain to use for the messages's return-path

options.name: sendAt
options.description: When this message should be sent as a UTC timestamp in YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS format. If you specify a time in the past, the message will be sent immediately. An additional fee applies for scheduled email, and this feature is only available to accounts with a positive balance.

options.name: signingDomain
options.description: A custom domain to use for SPF/DKIM signing instead of mandrill(for "via" or "on behalf of" in email clients)

options.name: subAccount
options.description: The unique ID of a subaccount for this message - must already exist or will fail with an error

options.name: subject
options.description: Subject line of the email

options.name: tags
options.description: An array of string separated by a comma (,) to tag the message with. Stats are accumulated using tags, though we only store the first 100 we see, so this should not be unique or change frequently. Tags should be 50 characters or less. Any tags starting with an underscore are reserved for internal use and will cause errors.

options.name: text
options.description: Example text content

options.name: trackClicks
options.description: Whether or not to turn on click tracking for the message

options.name: trackOpens
options.description: Whether or not to turn on open tracking for the message

options.name: trackingDomain
options.description: A custom domain to use for tracking opens and clicks instead of mandrillapp.com

options.name: urlStripQs
options.description: Whether or not to strip the query string from URLs when aggregating tracked URL data

options.name: viewContentLink
options.description: Whether to remove content logging for sensitive emails

options.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

conditional_rules: IF operation IN ["sendHtml", "sendTemplate"] THEN SHOW parameter 'fromEmail'
IF operation IN ["sendHtml", "sendTemplate"] THEN SHOW parameter 'toEmail'
IF operation IN ["sendHtml", "sendTemplate"] THEN SHOW parameter 'jsonParameters'
IF operation IN ["sendHtml", "sendTemplate"] THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF jsonParameters == True THEN SHOW parameter 'mergeVarsJson'
IF jsonParameters == False THEN SHOW parameter 'mergeVarsUi'
IF jsonParameters == False THEN SHOW parameter 'metadataUi'
IF jsonParameters == True THEN SHOW parameter 'metadataJson'
IF jsonParameters == True THEN SHOW parameter 'attachmentsJson'
IF jsonParameters == False THEN SHOW parameter 'attachmentsUi'
IF jsonParameters == True THEN SHOW parameter 'headersJson'
IF jsonParameters == False THEN SHOW parameter 'headersUi'
